mapper.select: SELECT a.ifcgSeq, a.ifcgName, a.ifcgUseNy, a.ifcgOrder, a.ifcgDesc, a.ifcgDelNy, a.regDateTime, a.regDateTimeRevise FROM newjeans.codegroup a ORDER BY a.ifcgSeq desc
mapper.insert: insert into codegroup ( ifcgName, ifcgUseNy, ifcgOrder, ifcgDesc, ifcgDelNy, regDateTime, regDateTimeRevise ) values ( "뉴진스", 1, 1, null, 1, now(), now() )
